title: Science communication best practice: CLEANFOREST
content: Academic papers for younger audiences CLEANFOREST is a multidisciplinary network of European scientists and forest experts that is developing a comprehensive understanding of the effects of key global change drivers on forest ecosystems. European forests play a crucial role in climate change mitigation and biodiversity conservation. Ensuring their health and resilience requires timely detection of changes in forest status and functioning. However, accurate predictions of their future ecolog...
creator: Lorna Stokes
